name: ShopNEXT Loyalty Token
description: ShopNEXT is a Web3 Loyalty Platform powered by Visa and BNB chain. We utilize blockchain, card payment and gamification to invent the Shop-To-Earn model. ShopNEXT allows users to earn token rewards from daily shopping while helping merchants grow their businesses. ShopNEXT token is a kind of loyalty point but the difference is that it is developed on blockchain and is exchangeable. Users can make money from selling the token on cryptocurrency exchanges. Thatâ€™s how Shop-To-Earn works!
